mapper.sql: ID, Distributor_code, Balance_before_recharge, Recharge, Balance_after_recharge, Create_date, Type, USER_CODE
mapper.select: SELECT a.* , c.NICK_NAME as DISTRIBUTION_NAME, d.NICK_NAME as OPERATOR_USER_NAME FROM t_flow_recharge_flow a INNER JOIN t_flow_distributor b ON a.Distributor_code = b.DISTRBUTOR_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user c ON a.USER_CODE = c.USER_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user d ON b.USER_CODE = d.USER_CODE limit #{start} , #{pageSize}

SELECT a.* , c.NICK_NAME as DISTRIBUTION_NAME, d.NICK_NAME as OPERATOR_USER_NAME FROM t_flow_recharge_flow a INNER JOIN t_flow_distributor b ON a.Distributor_code = b.DISTRBUTOR_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user c ON a.USER_CODE = c.USER_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user d ON b.USER_CODE = d.USER_CODE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_recharge_flow (ID, Distributor_code, Balance_before_recharge, Recharge, Balance_after_recharge, Create_date, Type, USER_CODE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balanceBeforeRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{recharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{balanceAfterRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_flow_recharge_flow
ID,
Distributor_code,
Balance_before_recharge,
Recharge,
Balance_after_recharge,
Create_date,
Type,
USER_CODE,

mapper.update:
update t_flow_recharge_flow
Distributor_code = #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Balance_before_recharge = #{balanceBeforeRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Recharge = #{recharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Balance_after_recharge = #{balanceAfterRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_recharge_flow set Distributor_code = #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Balance_before_recharge = #{balanceBeforeRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Recharge = #{recharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Balance_after_recharge = #{balanceAfterRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
